Primary Contact: Kevin MacDougall, Community Policing Coordinator; Phone: 250.765.6355
Service Details: - Community participation project composed of citizens who volunteer to become the extended eyes and ears of the police service- Participants patrol area, observe and report any incidents via radio to the RCMP for them to act upon
Eligibility: Potential volunteers must:- be a resident of the area- be at least 19 years of age- have no criminal record- be able to work within a structured environment- be able to work with other people- be able to commit 4 hours per week for a period of one year- have good writing and speaking skills- have no health or other problems that may impede you working in an office/community environment
Address & Map: 1190 Richter StKelowna, BC     V1Y 2K7View MapQuest Map
